item.title: BOOTLEG COMEDY - Beta
item.description: Yes... it is coming soon... all we gotta do is fill'er up with content... and we're done.... the content for this section is loaded from: http://72.51.37.19/bootlegcomedy/data/news.xml and is stored in standard RSS format... this will allow the news feed to be aggretated via various users chose RSS Aggregator.. the same goes for the VBlog, Video of the Day and the Joke of the Day later on a PHP Interface will be designed to allow easy management of all content, which will be pulled from a MySQK database...

item.title: Test New Entry 2
item.description: YOU HEARD WHAT I SAID IN THE LAST NEWS ENTRY.... GET ME SOME CONTENT... SO WE CAN POPULATE THIS SITE AND START MAKING SOME $$$

item.title: Test New Entry 1
item.description: News entry Content will goe here... now we just need some news to fill in the blanks.
